title: Request a Handicap Parking Placard
description: A citizen with a disability needs to apply for a handicap parking placard.

tasks.description: Provide the citizen with the application form, which requires a doctor's signature.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a link to the correct form and explains the requirements.

tasks.description: Receive the completed and signed application from the citizen.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the application and verifies it has been signed by a physician.

tasks.description: Process the application and issue the handicap parking placard.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent approves the application and mails the placard to the citizen.
